86108.summary: Some customers in the North St. Boniface area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
86108.title: Jan 17 - Winnipeg (North St. Boniface) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

86118.title: Jan 17 - Calgary (Cornerstone, Skyview Ranch, & Cityscape) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
